name: Wii were so close!
description:
"One last game..." you thought, as aliens started to invade Earth. That Wii game isn't going to finish itself!

But to make matters worse, even the sensor is against you.  Will you manage to score 50+ points while not getting distracted?

Controls: Use the mouse to move the Wiimote, line it up with the sensor to make it work.

This game is a submission for the "GMTK 2021 GameJam". The theme of this year is "Joined Together"

Programming: Pengu123 and Musket

Assets: Musket

Music/SFX: Pengu123
